item.title: Thought-Provoking Dystopian Novels That Reflect Our Society
item.description: Looking for a gripping read that will make you reflect on our society? Look no further than these five thought-provoking dystopian novels that are sure to leave you contemplating the world around us. 1984 by George Orwell, a classic dystopian novel that follows the story of Winston Smith, a man living in a totalitarian society ruled by the all-seeing Big Brother. As Winston begins to question the society he lives in, he becomes a target of the Party and must fight for his freedom.
